sn55.55:4.1: “Mendicants, when four things are developed and cultivated they lead to the realization of the fruit of stream-entry.
sn55.55:4.3: Associating with good people, listening to the true teaching, rational focus, and practicing in line with the teaching.
sn55.55:4.4: When these four things are developed and cultivated they lead to the realization of the fruit of stream-entry.”
